title: anbuLLa rAdhA
sahitya:
anbuLLa rAdhA nandi unmEl Ashai koNDu vandEn kaNNA


anupallavi

  ponmaNi aNiyillai inru pUtta kavimalar kOtta mAlaiyuDan


caraNam    manjaLaip-pUsi manjanam ADi andi vAnirap-paTTaNindE
mangaLamAga kumkumamiTTu vAsa malaraNik-kUndal muDittE
konjiLam kiLigaL kuyiluDan pEshum kuLirnda kAlaiyilE
kOdayaip-pOlE kuzhai manam urugi gOpAlA hari gOvindA ena
